field.name: summary
field.value: Possible issue when proxying implementation that implement the same Interface at differrent level in the inheritance chain

field.name: description
field.value:
When trying to create a small faility to auto ISynchronizeInvoke support throught interceptors, I received the following exception when proxying an implementation of System.Windows.Form. The inheritance hierarchy of System.Windows.Forms implemnt IDisposable several times.
+ InnerException {"Duplicate method Void Dispose() on type System.IDisposable"} System.Exception {System.ArgumentException}
